Languages.Language 1: The Languages it knew in life

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Fist, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 11 Bludgeoning, extra if the target is the creature the Revenant has sworn vengeance against

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Revenant makes 2 Fist attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Vengeful Glare, The Revenant targets one creature it has sworn vengeance against and galres at them, paralyzing them

Abilities.Ability 1: Regeneration, The Revenant heals unless it takes Fire or Radiant damage.  The only way to destroy a Revenant's body is with Fire or Radiant damage
Abilities.Ability 2: Rejuventation, When the Revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers and inhabits the body of another corpse on the same plane of existance.  Only a Wish spell is known to prevent the soul from reanimating
Abilities.Ability 3: Turn Immunity, The Revenant is immune to effects that turn undead
Abilities.Ability 4: Vengeful Tracker, The Revenant always knows the distance to and direction of any creature it is seeking revenge against
